entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Muskoka
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:56 a.m. EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 6.4Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 10:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 6.4°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 5.5°C
Wind: ESE 21 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Temperature steady near 10.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches developing after midnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 overnight. Temperature steady near 10. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the morning. Rain beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
